short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check and track Google SERP rankings for any website directly from Chrome, with options to export and copy results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Rank Checker is a powerful tool designed to simplify SEO monitoring and keyword tracking directly within your browser. It allows you to efficiently check the Google SERP rankings for any website, providing a quick and intuitive way to evaluate your SEO efforts.

Features:

•  Instant SERP Checking: Quickly determine the rank of any website for specified keywords on Google's global search results.
•  Multi-Keyword Support: Track multiple keywords simultaneously to see how well your site or a competitor's site is performing.
•  Customizable Search Options: Choose specific Google domains, languages, device types (desktop or mobile), and countries for accurate rank tracking.
•  Export Functionality: Easily export the ranking data to CSV or JSON format for detailed analysis and reporting.
•  Copy Results: Conveniently copy the ranking information to the clipboard for use in documents or presentations.

How It Works:

•  Enter the keyword(s) you want to track.
•  Select your desired search options: Google domain, language, device type, and country.
•  View the rank of the current website for the specified keyword(s).
•  Use the export or copy functions to save or share your findings.


Ideal for SEO professionals, marketers, and website owners, Google Rank Checker is your go-to solution for staying ahead in SEO. Optimize your efforts and track your progress with ease using this essential tool.
